case.title: Any real men out there - 32
case.text: Hi, I am a 32 yr old Puerto Rican female looking for what seems to be a dying breed. A real man who doesn't live with mommy has a job children r ok just no baby mama drama someone. Honest companionate loving and caring. I've already been thru all the losers so if ur a loser I will know it I have been told all the lies so if ur a liar don't bother. Just want to get to know a mature real man and see where it goes.
